# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(ADIOS2_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(ADIOS2)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
ADIOS2PluginInfo.C
ADIOS2CommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
ADIOS2PluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
ADIOS2MDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtADIOS2FileFormat.C
avtMEUMMAPSFileFormat.C
avtGTCFileFormat.C
avtPixie3DFileFormat.C
avtADIOS2BaseFileFormat.C
avtADIOS2SSTFileFormat.C
avtLAMMPSFileFormat.C
avtSpecFEMFileFormat.C
ADIOS2HelperFuncs.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
ADIOS2EnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtADIOS2FileFormat.C
avtMEUMMAPSFileFormat.C
avtGTCFileFormat.C
avtPixie3DFileFormat.C
avtADIOS2BaseFileFormat.C
avtADIOS2SSTFileFormat.C
avtLAMMPSFileFormat.C
avtSpecFEMFileFormat.C
ADIOS2HelperFuncs.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

set(vtk_libs VTK::FiltersHybrid VTK::vtksys )

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IADIOS2Database ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IADIOS2Database visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IADIOS2Database)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MADIOS2Database ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(MADIOS2Database PRIVATE ${ADIOS2_INCLUDE_DIR})
    TARGET_LINK_DIRECTORIES(MADIOS2Database PRIVATE ${ADIOS2_LIBRARY_DIR} )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MADIOS2Database visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${ADIOS2_LIB} ${vtk_libs} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MADIOS2Database MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MADIOS2Database)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EADIOS2Database_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(EADIOS2Database_ser PRIVATE ${ADIOS2_INCLUDE_DIR})
TARGET_LINK_DIRECTORIES(EADIOS2Database_ser PRIVATE ${ADIOS2_LIBRARY_DIR} )
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EADIOS2Database_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${ADIOS2_LIB} ${vtk_libs} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EADIOS2Database_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EADIOS2Database_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EADIOS2Database_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS(EADIOS2Database_par PRIVATE ADIOS2_USE_MPI )
    TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(EADIOS2Database_par PRIVATE ${ADIOS2_PAR_INCLUDE_DIR})
    TARGET_LINK_DIRECTORIES(EADIOS2Database_par PRIVATE ${ADIOS2_PAR_LIBRARY_DIR} )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EADIOS2Database_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${ADIOS2_PAR_LIB} ${vtk_libs} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EADIOS2Database_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EADIOS2Database_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases ADIOS2 ${INSTALLTARGETS})
